title: What should I do after passing class 12 (PCM) with 55%? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all there is nothing to worry regarding your score there are plenty of options available you can look for commerce in some of the colleges. Such as Hindustan university which is somewhat based on donation As you had maths therefore it will not be a problem No doubt you can do CA (chartered accountancy ) regarding whatever score you have made in 12th as you have passed 12th exam therefore it should not be a problem. BUT STUDY HARD IF YOU WANT TO GO FOR C.A . If. You are not a Commerce bie if you want to go for science you can go but remember it's tough for you to get admission in good colleges moreover you may not get decent jobs. So I would suggest give commerce or visual communications a chance Now regarding visual communications it is a very creative field so. It is a pre qusite that you should have good imagination and drawing as well as speaking skills REMEMBER IN THIS FIELD CONTACTS with people play a vital role then. Only you can work with some of the best directors in the country. After doing a degree in bsc visual communications You can. go for the following Wildlife photographer Vfx artist Graphic designer Illustrator User experience designer Public relations manager Copywriters Art director Chief creative officers And many more google it there are plenty more than what I have stated above.
